Package controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is used to manage the flow of data and view of the application's Customer GUI form.
Author:
David Long

    • modifyCustomer

      static boolean modifyCustomer

    • filter

      ComboBoxInterface filter
      Lambda expression used for filtering and setting Division names to be displayed in the "custStateComboBox". It takes in a country's ID as a parameter, to be used as the filter. It then iterates through the list of division objects, comparing the ID of the selected country to the division's country ID. When a match is found, the name of the matching division is added to an Observable list. That list of division names is then set into the "custStateComboBox". A lambda expression was chosen here for clarity and conciseness.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerController

      public CustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method loads the form's GUI elements and sets the country ComboBox with all available countries. If a customer was selected for modification, the fields and ComboBoxes are set with the selected customer data. Otherwise, all form fields and selections are empty.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location of the controller's .fxml file
      resourceBundle - The locale-specific resources for the controller's objects

    • onActionCancelCustomer

      void onActionCancelCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method throws a specific warning dialog box, depending on whether the user was attempting to modify an existing customer or add a new customer. Upon the user selecting "yes" button in the respective dialog box, the scene is then changed to the "MainForm" GUI.
      Parameters:
      event - "Cancel" button click
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by FXMLLoader.load() if the .fxml file URL is not input correctly

    • onActionSaveCustomer

      void onActionSaveCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method checks the form for empty and non-selected fields, then inserts the form's user input data into the corresponding SQL statement depending on whether the user is intending to create a new customer or modify an existing customer. Upon successfully modifying the "customers" table, the scene is then changed to the "MainForm" GUI.
      Parameters:
      event - "Save" button click
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors
      IOException - thrown by FXMLLoader.load() if the .fxml file URL is not input correctly

    • onCountrySelection

      void onCountrySelection(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      This method changes the available selections in the "custStateComboBox" depending on which country is selected in the "custCountryComboBox".
      Parameters:
      event - selection made in "custCountryComboBox"
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors
